transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello yes mam Himanshu bol raha Himanshu bol raha tha mam India Mart se.
Customer: Ha boliye. 
Executive: Aapki baat ha mam baat ho gayi aapki sir se?
Customer: Ha baat ho gayi hai sir. Unka to bolna hai ki sari lead bahut genuine hai. Mai unka mail id mujhe bhej dijiye aap. Mai unko pura sheet bhej de rahi hu.
Executive: Thik hai mam aapko share kar denge. 
Customer: To unko bhi pata chalega. Hmm.
Executive: Achha mere se mere ko mam thoda sa aapse ye discuss karna tha na kuch buyleads ko lekar ke aapne not relevant bhi mark kiya tha. To iske regarding mere ko thoda sa aapse ye janna tha ki buyleads aapne not relevant mark kiya hai wo wrong product me bhi mark kiya hua hai aur kuch wrong locations ko lekar ke bhi kiya hua hai. To jaise mai ye janna chah raha tha mam jo ha to ye jaise aapne kiya tha to location ko lekar ke matlab kaha kaha ki location ko lekar ke aapko nahi chahiye hoti leads thoda mujhe batayenge mam?
Customer: Tamil Nadu ka jo rehta hai na Tamil Nadu Karnataka Assam in is taraf ka jo leads rehta hai na mujhe to hum thoda kam prefer karte hai. Baki vaise to dene ko koi problem nahi hai but usme wo log bhi bolte hai ki hame local se hi chahiye hum local me hi search kar rahe hai.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Aisa unka requirement aata hai isliye maine koi koi leads me aisa mark kiya tha.
Executive: Wrong ha actually vahi mere ko janna tha kyuki mam feedback aaya tha na to maine kaha ek baar aapse iske regarding bhi baat karna tha mujhe. To ye batayiye mam jaise wrong wrong product me jo aapne mark kiya hua hai jaise aapne buyleads purchase kiya hai EOT crane ka kiya hua hai ya kuch lekin usko bhi aapne wrong product me mark kar diya tha. Kya reason hai mam thoda bata payenge ki wrong product me kyu?
Customer: To mai aapko dekh ke bata sakti hu kaha dikhta hai ye maine kya?
Executive: Ye mam aapne kiya hoga na to ye aapko idea hoga is cheez ka kyuki past ye aapne jo not
Customer: Hmm. Irrelevant aapne dekh sakti hu ye list jo maine kiya hai ki not relevant kaha se dikhega mujhe ye list to mai aapko bata sakti hu proper.
Executive: Achha ye mam jaise agar aapne jo apna wo bana rakha hai sheet usme mention nahi kiya tha kya jaise agar aapne banaya hoga sheet?
Customer: Nahi actually usme kaisa hai not not relevant me aisa mark kiya hai to un logo ka koi particular make ka hota hai na har ek make chahiye ya fir aisa koi particular make rehta hai to usme humne mark kiya hai that's not not relevant jaisa.
Executive: Achha ek baar mam past transactions me dekh sakti hai kya past transactions me?
Customer: Ek minute ha.
Executive: Buyleads me jaaiye buyleads me ja kar ke past transactions hoga ek.
Customer: Ek minute ha. Ha ha ek minute dekh lijiye.
Customer: Ha past transactions me gayi mai. Ha. Four wheeler crane jo hai ye hamare kaam ki nahi hai.
Executive: Achha isme hum matlab ye basically wrong product hai ye basically right?
Customer: Right ye wrong product hai. Iske alawa
Executive: Ye ye suggested ye suggested ye relevant lead me wale section me aapko show kiya tha?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Achha nahi ye lead hi aayi thi mere paas actually.
Executive: Achha ha vahi mai puch raha hu relevant leads matlab leads me hi aapka relevant wale section me aapko matlab jo aapko suggested lead hoti hai usme hi show kar raha tha?
Customer: Ha ye past leads me show kar raha hai iske alawa fir damaged EOT crane likha hai us wo bhi hum usme deal nahi karte hai damaged me deal nahi karte hai isliye uske hum interested aisa nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Achha ha.
Customer: Second hand crane hai.
Executive: Second hand cranes pe to aap deal hi nahi karte ho to mai janta hu ha.
Executive: Aur aur batayiye mam.
Customer: Sir ye bridge cranes hai yesterday me bridge crane.
Executive: Bridge cranes achha bridge cranes me aap deal nahi karte kya?
Customer: Nahi bridge cranes me nahi deal karte mam.
Executive: Achha. Achha ha ha.
Customer: Ha ji.
Customer: Electric hoist crane.
Executive: Electric hoist crane okay. Thik hai. Aur ye achha mam ye jo hamara 25 ton wall mounted JIB crane isme jaise hamara ye hai wall mounted JIB cranes isme hum deal karte hai na?
Customer: Ha JIB crane me karte hai hum dealing.
Executive: Achha achha. Achha.
Executive: To ye jo wrong product me mark kiya tha mam ye matlab aapne apne hisab se jo basically jo aapko nahi tha relevant usi ko aapne wrong as an feedback ke taur pe diya hai right?
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Ha achha. Achha location me mam hum to vaise all India matlab kar sakte hai na vaise to service agar hum dena chahe apne product ko lekar.
Customer: Ha all India kar sakte hai. Koi problem nahi hai location wise agar koi reject hua hoga na to usme description me aap dekhiyega usme local dealer ka aisa koi line likha hoga is vajah se wo location wise usko reject kiya hai.
Executive: Okay okay. Thik hai thik hai mam isi ke regarding aapko kiya tha thik hai mam thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai mam okay thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Ha ji.
Customer: Nahi nahi kuch nahi sir.
Executive: Thik hai mam thik hai.
Customer: Okay thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know why leads marked irrelevant.

- Marked wrong product and location leads.



Resolution:

- Executive inquired about irrelevant leads.

- Customer explained criteria for marking leads irrelevant.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, product, relevant
